Title: Utopia
Actors: Manfred Zapatka, Imke Barnstedt, Gundula Petrovska, Gabriele Fischer
Plot: A treatise on love and desire tainted by harsh reality of capitalism, in which submission to the laws of lust-as-commerce is played out by five prostitutes and their pimp, who pits them against one another so that they are incapable of standing up to him collectively.
